Name: Dean Elgar
detail: In March 2021, Cricket SA announced that Elgar had been appointed as SA's Test captain

Name: Sarel Erwee
detail: He is a left-handed batsman and a right-arm off-break bowler who plays for KwaZulu Natal.

Name: Janneman Malan
detail: He made his international debut for the SA in February 2019.

Name: David Miller
detail: He is an aggressive left-handed middle order batsman and an occasional wicket-keeper.

Name: Keegan Petersen
detail: A right-handed batsman, occasional wicket-keeper and occasional leg break

Name: Ryan Rickelton
detail: He made his international debut for the SA cricket team on 31 March 2022.

Name: Khaya Zondo
detail: He made his international debut for the SA cricket team in February 2018.

Name: Quinton de Kock
detail: He became the fourth player to score three successive one-day centuries and the second player to score four ODI centuries before his 21st birthday

Name: Heinrich Klaasen
detail: He was included in the Northerns cricket team squad for the 2015 Africa T20 Cup

Name: Marco Jansen
detail: During his early years, Jansen used to open the batting. At the age of nine, in a 20-over match, he scored 164 not out

Name: Wayne Parnell
detail: he is a SAn professional cricketer who most recently played for Northamptonshire in English county cricket.

Name: Dwaine Pretorius
detail: he is a SAn professional cricketer who currently plays for Highveld Lions. He has represented SA at international level.

Name: Daryn Dupavillon
detail: He is a right-arm fast bowler who also bats right-handed.
